author: Baha'u'llah
source_text: العارفین عمّروا بیوتًا لا تخربها الأمطار وتحفظکم من حوادث الزّمان کذلک یعلّمکم هذا المظلوم الفرید.
translation: Build ye for yourselves such houses as the rain and floods can never destroy, which shall protect you from the changes and chances of this life. This is the instruction of Him Whom the world hath wronged and forsaken.
